column1: Property                                 Description (Japanese)                   Writable  Observable  Schema                                                   EPC   Description (English)
acEffectiveChargingCapacity             AC実効容量 (充電)                       FALSE     FALSE       number (Wh)
acEffectiveDischargingCapacity          AC実効容量 (放電)                       FALSE     FALSE       number (Wh)
acChargeableCapacity                    AC充電可能容量                          FALSE     FALSE       number (Wh)
acDischargeableCapacity                 AC放電可能容量                          FALSE     FALSE       number (Wh)
acChargeableElectricEnergy              AC充電可能量                            FALSE     FALSE       number (Wh)
acDischargeableElectricEnergy           AC放電可能量                            FALSE     FALSE       number (Wh)
acChargeUpperLimit                      AC充電上限設定                          TRUE      FALSE       number (%)
column3: max: 100                           0xA6  AC charge upper limit setting

column1: acDischargeLowerLimit                   AC放電下限設定                          TRUE      FALSE       number (%)
column3: max: 100                           0xA7  AC discharge lower limit setting

column1: acCumulativeChargingElectricEnergy      AC積算充電電力量計測値                  FALSE     FALSE       number (kWh)
column4: multipleOf: 0.001 0xA8  AC measured cumulative charging electric energy

column1: acCumulativeDischargingElectricEnergy   AC積算放電電力量計測値                  FALSE     FALSE       number (kWh)
column4: multipleOf: 0.001 0xA9  AC measured cumulative discharging electric energy

column1: acTargetChargingElectricEnergy          AC充電量設定値                          TRUE      TRUE        number (Wh)
column3: max: 999999999 or "noSetting"     0xAA  AC charge amount setting value

column1: acTargetDischargingElectricEnergy       AC放電量設定値                          TRUE      TRUE        number (Wh)
column3: max: 999999999 or "noSetting"     0xAB  AC discharge amount setting value

column1: chargingMethod                          充電方式                                TRUE      TRUE        string
dischargingMethod                       放電方式                                TRUE      TRUE        string
acRatedElectricEnergy                   AC定格電力量                            FALSE     FALSE       number (Wh)
